Html:
Hi - can someone explain whether the ImageHandler module is currently used and what it's intention is.

thanks!
steven
The ImageHandler is used to generate the Vote Counter Image.

Thanks - I see it is the Counter Code on each story... i was thinking it was the "Shout" vote counter on the left.

many thanks,
steven

The Shout counter to put in any external site, check my blog posts, it has this counter at the end of each post.
